title: Akufo-Addo Extends Easter Greetings To Ghanaians As He Urges Prayer And Safety Amid Celebrations - YEN.COM.GH
text: Akufo-Addo Extends Easter Greetings To Ghanaians As He Urges Prayer And Safety Amid Celebrations - President Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo has extended heartfelt wishes to Ghanaians to mark Easter - A post on Facebook spreads love and hopes the blood shed on the cross during Easter would bring healing to the nation - The uplifting message of the president resonated deeply as it sparked heartwarming comments and solidarity across social media The President of the Republic of Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, has extended warm greetings to Ghanaians to commemorate the [Easter](https://yen.com.gh/tags/easter/). In his heartfelt message, delivered on behalf of his wife, Rebecca Akufo-Addo, his children, [family](https://yen.com.gh/tags/family/), and his administration, he expressed optimism that the importance of the blood shed on the cross during Easter would bring healing to the nation and cleanse it of sins. Akufo-Addo urges safety [The president](https://yen.com.gh/politics/231460-easter-akufo-addo-urges-christians-reflect-christs-sacrifice-hope-brings-celebration) emphasised the importance of safety during this festive season, urging everyone to drive safely and keep the country in their prayers. He encouraged Ghanaians to adhere to safety measures while participating in Easter conventions, parties, picnics, and traditional Kwahu Easter celebrations. Read the complete [statement here](https://web.facebook.com/photo/?). Akufo-Addo sparks a wave of reactions [The president’s](https://twitter.com/NAkufoAddo?) Easter message elicited a wave of reactions online as netizens shared their thoughts and sentiments on the heartfelt [wishes](https://yen.com.gh/108583-good-luck-wishes-exam-girlfriend.html). Mabel Oti-Boadi said: Amen, and a Happy birthday to you. God has really been faithful to you. Remain blessed, Mr President. Victor Asiedu-Young commented: Happy Easter celebration to you as well. Stay blessed, YE, Mr President. Christian Alan Aggrey Amen. Happy Easter Easter and happy birthday, sir. Many more years. Ohene Bruce wrote: Black Princesses captain Afi Amenyeku presents gold medal from African Games 2023 to her proud father Amen, daddy. [Kwadwo](https://yen.com.gh/facts-lifehacks/biographies/205690-kwadwo-nkansah-lilwin-age-net-worth-movies-house-cars-latest-updates/) Agyekum Thank you, sir, wishing you a happy Easter and birthday as well Mr President Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo. Akufo-Addo launches Ghana Smart Schools project YEN.com.gh previously reported that President Akufo-Addo has unveiled plans to distribute smart tablets to 1.3 million Senior High School (SHS) students nationwide. This forms part of the [president’s vision](https://yen.com.gh/education/254302-akufo-addo-ghana-smart-schools-project-one-student-one-laptop) to equip students under the free SHS policy with essential technological skills through the Ghana Smart Schools Project.
